channel.title: Making .cfg files
channel.description:
right i am not really new to all the server stuff but i wanna make some new .cfg files
can somebody please tell me how to do it
i have notepad and notepad++
i am asking this because i amde a range guild spawn file and i told npchandler to open it but i get this error
[code]NPCHandler.java:25: cannot find symbol symbol : method loadRangeGuildSpawn(java.lang.String) location: class NPCHandler loadRangeGuildSpawn("RangeGuildSpawn.txt"); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 [/code]
i was wondering if it because the range guild autospawn is not .cfg
that is if it works[br][size=1]Posted at: November 16, 2006, 05:52:40 PM[/size][hr]plz someone answer my question
